div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 816 Suluc, near Macin (anc. Arrubium), (1015) c. 20 km. SSE of Galati, Rumania, 1932 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: c. 200 AR Istrus: dr. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 2 Moisil, Cabinetul numismatic 1938-42, p. 22, no. 187 Mitrea, StudClas 7 (1965), p. 162
